attributes.action: Repeal the hated human rights act which puts the rights of illegal asylum seekers and criminals above the rights of the law abiding and indigenous population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Repeal the hated human rights act which puts the rights of illegal asylum seekers and criminals above the rights of the law abiding and indigenous population."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14348.asp

Prime Minister's Office
